name: 倩女幽魂2023
description:
"A Chinese Ghost Story 2023" is a traditional large-scale turn-based role-playing game. The game tells a touching love story between the scholar Ning Caichen and the ghost Nie Xiaoqian!

This work has rich plots, and the main classic plots include: Xiahou swordsman fights all the thieves alone, Guobei County collects debts and is humiliated, Yan Chixia fights Xiahou swordsman, stays at Lanruo Temple overnight, meets Nie Xiaoqian for the first time, Yan Chixia fights the thousand-year-old tree demon for the first time, Ning Chixia Caichen successfully collects the bill, the thousand-year-old tree demon sells Xiaoqian to the old demon of Montenegro, Ning Caichen strays into the lair of the thousand-year-old tree demon, Xiaoqing is killed instead of harming others, Ning Caichen's government beats drums to appeal for grievances, Yan Chixia reveals the truth The truth, Yan Chixia sets up a trap to trap Xiaoqian, Xiaoqian confides her heart to Ning Caichen, Yan Chixia fights the thousand-year-old tree demon, Montenegro old demon snatches marriage, night breaks into the underworld, visits Qin Guangwang, hell trial, Ksitigarbha Bodhisattva Pointing to the maze, borrowing water spirit beads from the Weihe Dragon Palace, visiting the fire ghost king in Fengdu, and exterminating the old demon of Montenegro.

Ning Caichen went to Guobei County to collect the bills. During heavy rain, he hid in the legendary Lanruo Temple for the night, but was rejected by the Taoist priest Yan Chixia, so Ning Caichen sneaked into the temple secretly.

At nightfall, Ning Caichen was attracted by the sound of a piano, and met a girl named Nie Xiaoqian. Nie Xiaoqian suddenly showed her murderous intent, but luckily Yan Chixia arrived and saved Ning Caichen's life. Nie Xiaoqian felt that she was upright and kind, and gradually fell in love with her, but was stopped by Yan Chixia. Ning Caichen mistook Yan Chixia for the murderer and wanted to escape with Nie Xiaoqian.

The dryad's grandmother forced Nie Xiaoqian to kill Ning Caichen, but Nie Xiaoqian refused, so she ordered all the demons to kill Ning Caichen and Nie Xiaoqian, Yan Chixia appeared to save the two, and the dryad's grandmother fell into the hands of Yan Chixia after the battle Lei was sealed for a hundred years.

Only then did Ning Caichen learn that Nie Xiaoqian turned out to be a ghost. Because her bones were abandoned in the wilderness, she was controlled by her grandmother. In order to prevent Nie Xiaoqian from being humiliated again, Ning Caichen agreed to send her bones back to the countryside for burial and reincarnation. Unexpectedly, Nie Xiaoqian was taken as his wife by the old demon of the underworld. Yan Chixia couldn't bear Ning Caichen's begging, decided to fight again, and finally rescued Xiaoqian.
However, Nie Xiaoqian is a ghost. After Ning Caichen said goodbye to Nie Xiaoqian, Nie Xiaoqian reluctantly went to reincarnate!
In the end Nie Xiaoqian was successfully reincarnated, and Ning Caichen and Nie Xiaoqian reunited a few years later...
